title: brownie run script - unable to deploy on polygon-test network
body:
### Environment information

* `brownie` Version: last
* `ganache-cli` Version: last
* `solc` Version: last
* `Python` Version: last
* `OS`: linux

### What was wrong?
I am tryng to deploy a simple contract and i get the following error:
```
Brownie v1.18.1 - Python development framework for Ethereum

PolygonTestProject is the active project.
  File "brownie/_cli/run.py", line 51, in main
    return_value, frame = run(
  File "brownie/project/scripts.py", line 53, in run
    module = _import_from_path(script)
  File "brownie/project/scripts.py", line 149, in _import_from_path
    _import_cache[import_str] = importlib.import_module(import_str)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/importlib/__init__.py", line 127, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "<frozen, line line, in in
  File "./scripts/deploy.py", line 1, in <module>
    from brownie import SimpleStorage, accounts, network, config
ImportError: cannot import name 'SimpleStorage' from 'brownie' (/home/user/.local/pipx/venvs/eth-brownie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/brownie/__init__.py)
user@ubuntu~/Desktop/polygon-test$ 
```
